text: Paul DelVecchio Jr. (born July 5, 1980), publicly known as DJ Pauly D, is an American television personality and disc jockey. He is best known for being a housemate on MTV's reality show Jersey Shore. He is the first of the Jersey Shore cast to get his own spin-off show, The Pauly D Project. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American DJs Category:People from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Television personalities from New Jersey
title: Pauly D
